detailsData.title: Leaders Among Lawyers
detailsData.content: Chris Dolan and firm attorneys serve on the boards of directors of local, state, and national professional associations that promote access to justice and safeguard the rights of the injured and employees.

detailsData.title: Outstanding Track Record
detailsData.content: When you retain us, you will be represented by one of the premier plaintiffs’ law firms in California that has recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for its clients.

detailsData.title: Real Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: Your attorney will be trial tested and ready. Because defendants know we take cases to trial every year and prevail, we regularly obtain settlements for our clients far above industry averages.

detailsData.title: The Resources To Win
detailsData.content: Our substantial financial and technological resources, access to experts, and superior legal skills enable our clients to hold even the most rich and powerful wrongdoers accountable.

subHeading: California Top Rated Personal Injury Lawyers
valueProp: For over 20 years, the personal injury attorneys at the Dolan Law Firm have prosecuted strong, effective cases and achieved hundreds of millions of dollars in recoveries for our clients in the San Francisco Bay Area and across California.

testimonalData.text: Seeking legal aid from Dolan law firm was the best decision I ever made. The staff was very kind and efficiently walked me through my inquiry.
testimonalData.author: Jose Sanchez

testimonalData.text: Very caring and patient team! Would definitely recommend to hire them if you’re in a tough situation.
testimonalData.author: Teisha Haynes

testimonalData.text: Inquiring with the Dolan Law firm was a really easy process and their staff was helpful in explaining how the process works!
testimonalData.author: Juriiji Derklee
